actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow an investment credit for certain domestic infant formula manufacturing projects and to allow a domestic production credit for certain infant formula.
short_title: Infant Formula Made in America Act of 2024

summary.text:
Infant Formula Made in America Act of 2024

This bill allows a 30% investment tax credit for infant formula that is lawfully sold and manufactured in the United States. It also allows a domestic production tax credit for such infant formula.

titles.title: Infant Formula Made in America Act of 2024
Infant Formula Made in America Act of 2024

To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow an investment credit for certain domestic infant formula manufacturing projects and to allow a domestic production credit for certain infant formula.
